perturbation.original_text:
(a) Payments. In consideration for provision of the Content and all rights granted hereunder, Emdeon hereby agreed to pay WebMD the amounts set forth on Exhibit B of this Agreement. All amounts payable shall be due be due thirty (30) days after the receipt of WebMD’s invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. All fees charged hereunder by WebMD are net of any such taxes.
(c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) Payments. In consideration for provision of the Content and all rights granted hereunder, Emdeon hereby agreed to pay WebMD the amounts set forth on Exhibit B of this Agreement. All amounts payable shall be due be due sixty (60) days after the receipt of WebMD’s invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. All fees charged hereunder by WebMD are net of any such taxes.
(c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline in section 4(a) to 'sixty (60) days' while the original text specifies 'thirty (30) days'. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the actual due date for payments and when late fees may apply.

perturbation.original_text:
4. Fees and Payment.
-4-
Source: WEBMD HEALTH CORP., S-1/A, 9/8/2005

 
(a) Payments. In consideration for provision of the Content and all rights granted hereunder, Emdeon hereby agreed to pay WebMD the amounts set forth on Exhibit B of this Agreement. All amounts payable shall be due be due thirty (30) days after the receipt of WebMD’s invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. All fees charged hereunder by WebMD are net of any such taxes.
(c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.changed_text:
4. Fees and Payment.
-4-
Source: WEBMD HEALTH CORP., S-1/A, 9/8/2005

 
(a) Payments. In consideration for provision of the Content and all rights granted hereunder, Emdeon hereby agreed to pay WebMD the amounts set forth on Exhibit B of this Agreement. All amounts payable shall be due upon receipt of WebMD's invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. All fees charged hereunder by WebMD are net of any such taxes.
(c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a direct contradiction regarding payment terms. Section 4(a) now states that payment is due 'upon receipt of WebMD's invoice,' conflicting with the original term of 'thirty (30) days after the receipt of WebMD's invoice.' This will cause uncertainty about the precise due date.

All amounts payable shall be due be due thirty (30) days after the receipt of WebMD’s invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. (c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.changed_text:
All amounts payable shall be due be due thirty (30) days after the receipt of WebMD’s invoice.
(b) Taxes. All payments under the Agreement are exclusive of all federal, state, local and foreign taxes, levies and assessments. Emdeon agrees to bear and be responsible for the payment of all such taxes, levies and assessments imposed on WebMD arising out of this Agreement, excluding any tax based on WebMD’s net income. All fees charged hereunder by WebMD are net of any such taxes.
(c) Late payments are not subject to any interest charge.
perturbation.explanation: This change directly contradicts the original interest policy on late payments. By stating 'Late payments are not subject to any interest charge,' it opposes the original clause imposing interest at 'one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.' This inconsistency will lead to confusion and potential disputes over whether interest applies to late payments.
